  def test_get_file_pointer
    platform_test("darwin") do
      begin 
        filepath = File.expand_path("background_test.txt")
        File.open(filepath, 'w+') do |file|
          file.extend FileExt
          file << "hello world"
          file.pos = 0
          assert file.read_from_file(5)
        end
      ensure
        FileUtils.rm(filepath) if File.exists?(filepath)
      end
    end
  end
